CustomField.description: To be auto-mapped from Form to track if type of Attendee to drive additional automation around Opp and/or Relationship creation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This should be mapped automatically from a Form. Required when manually adding attendees. Select Prospect/Applicant when the attendee is a student, select 'Guest' when the attendee is a guest of the student, such as a family member. Guests only apply for Open House events.
CustomField.label: Attendee Type
